title: HELP!
body: someone else I don't know who has my password and login and I cant change my password due to not having that email anymore can riot change it for me?

replies.body: Damn, that can feel pretty scary.  Don't worry though, we can help with updating your information and getting your account back in your hands.  Hit us up through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416), and our account recovery team will investigate further.  We'll reply back as soon as we can!
